page.title: 09Churches in Johnstone
page.content: The High Parish,Church of Scotland built in 1772 is the oldest church in Johnstone,and is still in good repair. St.Pauls, built in 1791, is also Church of Scotland.Both are situated in the town centre.St.Aidans is a R.C. church built in 1967 and it is very modern compared with St.Margaret's, another R.C. church which was built in 1852,but is still in good condition. Johnstone Castle has 2 churches and Spateston has 1.In Johnstone Castle stands St.Margaret's and St.Andrew's. St.Andrew's was situated down the town untill 1978 when the original church built in 1844 became in a bad state of repair. In Spateston there is also a R.C. Church called St.Anthony's.Since then a Church of the Latter Day Saints has been built.(A Mormon Church).All of these churches have clubs for all ages.
